meanings.definition: A respectful gesture of greeting or acknowledgment, typically performed by women by bending the knees and lowering the body.
meanings.sent1: During the play, the princess ended her performance with a graceful curtsying.
meanings.sent2: At the royal ball, the ladies practiced curtsying before meeting the queen.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended she was curtsying to her stuffed animals in her room.
meanings.sent4: The curtsying of the trees in the wind made the forest seem alive.
meanings.sent5: The curtsying of the waves to the shore was a beautiful sight.
